T04acatstvu:3: sa sarvabuddhakṣetraparṣanṃaṇḍalānugataḥ kāyo dharmasvabhāvagatiṃgatatvān manomaya ity ucyate /
T04acatstvu:4: yadā cittaṃ manaś cāpi vijñānaṃ na pravartate /
T04acatstvu:5: tadā manomayaṃ kāyaṃ labhate buddhabhūmiṃ ca //
T04acatstvu:8: tathā sa sarvaśaś cittamanovijñānavikalpasaṃjñāpagato 'navagṛhīta ākāśasamo 'bhyavakāśaprakṛtito 'vatīrṇaś cānutpattikadharmakṣāntiprāpta ity ucyate /
T04acatstvu:9: tatra bhavanto jinaputrāḥ evaṃ kṣāntisamanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ sahapratilambhād acalāyā
T04acatstvu:10: bodhisattvabhūmer gaṃbhīraṃ bodhisattvavihāram anuprāpto bhavati durājñānam asaṃbhinnaṃ
T04acatstvu:12: sa evaṃ kṣāntipratilabdho bodhisattvo yatra yatropasaṃkrāmati kṣatriyabrāhmaṇavaiśyaśūdradevabrahmapariṣadaṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇītīrthikamāraparṣadaṃ (Css 239)
T04acatstvu:13: sarvatrātīto niḥśaṅkam upasaṃkrāmati viśārada eva pravyāharati /
T04acatstvu:15: sa hy anutpattikadharmakṣāntilābhāt sarvadharmānutpādākāreṇa sarvathā sarvaṃ pratividdhavāstu
T04acatstvu:16: .. mād asya aparajñānakṛtaṃ kleśakṛtaṃ ca parṣacchāradyaṃ nāstīti vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ
T04acatstvu:27: ity evaṃ daśavaśitāprāpto yas tvaṃ dṛṣṭivipannasya lokasyāsya hitodyata ity anena ca praśastapratipattir ameyatvam acittatā coktā /
T04acatstvu:28: vakṣyamāneṣv api sarveṣu pratyekam arthatrayaṃ yojyam /
T04acatstvu:32: tatra dharmāś caturvidhā vipaśyanādharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanādayaḥ bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ
T04acatstvu:33: smṛtyupasthānādayaḥ buddhadharmā daśabalavaiśāradyādayaḥ adhigamadharmāḥ śrotaāpattimārgaphalādayo yathākramam /
T04acatstvu:35: tatra bauddhaṃ cakṣur dhyānābhisaṃskāranirvṛttam abhijñāsaṃgṛhītam aṣṭāvidhaparikarmalabhyatvāt kumārabhuvaḥ /
T04acatstvu:37: iti / tenāpi cakṣuṣā tvayā na kiṃcid dṛṣṭaṃ saṃbhāvyate prāg evetaraiḥ /
T04acatstvu:38: pañcānām api cakṣuṣām anavabhāsagamanatvāt tattvārthasya dṛṣṭijñānam /
T04acatstvu:40: nanu pratilabdhaprathamādibhuvo 'pi āryā na kaṃcid dharmam upalabhante tat ko 'syātiśaya ity āha /
T04acatstvu:43: pūrvakās tu sapta vihārā vyāmiśrā ayam ekāntaśuddhaḥ /
T04acatstvu:45: yadā punaḥ sarvaprāyogikacaryāṃ vihāya saptamyā bhūmer aṣṭamīṃ bhūmim avakrānto bhavati tadā pariśuddhaṃ bodhisattvayānam abhirūhya ityādi /
T04acatstvu:46: tasmād eva gambhīrāṇāṃ bodhisattvavihārāṇāṃ nānyo 'smād adhiko gaṃbhīro ity atrānuttarety ucyate //
T04acatstvu:47: pravicayo lakṣaṇataḥ kṛtyato hetutaḥ phalataḥ saṃkhyāta āsvādata ādīnavato niḥsaraṇataś ca kleśato vyavadānataḥ parijñātaḥ prahāṇataḥ sākṣātkaraṇato bhāvanātaś ca /
T04acatstvu:55: tathā coktaṃ yāvat tathāgatavaineyikānāṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgatakāyavarṇarūpam ādarśayati /
T04acatstvu:56: iti hi bho jinaputra yāvanto 'nabhilāpyeṣu buddhakṣetraprasareṣu sattvānām upapattyāyatanādhimuktiprasarās teṣu teṣu tathāgataḥ svakāyavibhaktim ādarśayati /
T04acatstvu:58: tac cāsya kāyasaṃdarśanam akṣūṇam avandhyaṃ ca sarvasattvaparipākavinayāyetyādi /
T04acatstvu:60: tathā hi saptamyāṃ bhūmau buddhakāyavyūhaṃ jānāti na tu tadā niṣpādayituṃ śaknoti /
T04acatstvu:61: buddhakāyavyūhajñānāt tu tasyāṃ bhūmau niṣpādanecchāṃ jānāti /
T04acatstvu:64: etasyā eva kṣānteḥ sahapratilambhād yāny asya sugatidurgativipākyāni karmāvaraṇāni tāny asya samucchinnāni bhavanti /
T04acatstvu:65: anyatra (Css 242) tathāgatānām anāgatajanatānukampadarśanād ata etadvibhāge ślokaḥ /
T04acatstvu:69: tatrotpādavigamān nityo nirodhavigamād dhruvaḥ śivo dvayābhāvāt /
T04acatstvu:75: sarveṣv apy avasthitārthatrayopasaṃhāradvāreṇā bhagavato guṇānāṃ kīrtanena prasūtapuṇyasyāsyāṃ bhuvi sattvānāṃ pratiṣṭhāpanāya pariṇāmanārthenaika uktaḥ /
T04acatstvu:76: tatra praśastagamanād punarāvṛttyā ca sugataḥ atarkyatvād alāpyatvād āryajñānād acintyatety acintyaḥ aprameyaṃ aprameyāśrayaparāvṛttyā vibhutvalābhāt
T04acatstvu:77: tathā hy asyāṃ bhūmau nirantamahābodhisamudāgamaprayogasamādhiṣu vyavasthito bodhisattvo
T04acatstvu:83: svābhāvikī syād yadi vastusiddhir udīrṇadīpetaraśāntisiddhivat tadā sarvakleśamaheśvarasya carato mohasya śāntiḥ katham /
T04acatstvu:85: pratītyajānāṃ bhāvānāṃ naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ jagādaya ityādy āha /
T04acatstvu:87: (Css 243) iha bodhisattvas tenāpi vihāreṇa gaṃbhīreṇāsaṃtuṣṭa uttarijñānaviseṣatām
T04acatstvu:88: anugacchan yaiś ca dharmajñānābhisaṃskāraiḥ pareṣāṃ dharmaḥ sarvākāro bodhisattvena
T04acatstvu:89: deśayitavyo yac ca dharmākhyānakṛtyaṃ tat sarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T04acatstvu:91: gahanopavicāreṣu ye ca saṃkliśyante viśuddhyante yena ca saṃkliśyante viśuddhyante
T04acatstvu:92: yac ca saṃkleṣavyavadānaṃ yā ca tasyānaikāntikatā yā ca tasyaikāntikānaikāntikatā
T04acatstvu:94: evaṃ ca deśanākuśalasya deśanākṛtyakuśalasya ca yat sarvākāramahādharmabhāṇakatvam ityādi yathāsūtram eva vistarato veditavyam /
T04acatstvu:95: asamajñānam iti daśamyāṃ tathāgatakṛtyenāvasthitatvād yathoktam āryadaśabhūmake /
T04acatstvu:96: yāvad daśānāṃ samādhyasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇāṃ paryante sarvajñajñānaviśeṣābhiṣekavān nāma bodhisattvasamādhir āmukhībhavatītyādi /
T04acatstvu:99: na punaḥ kurute yatnaṃ paripākāya dehinām // 1
T04acatstvu:100: yo yathā yena vaineyo manyate 'sau tathaiva ca /
T04acatstvu:106: athā cāṇoḥ pṛthivyāś ca goṣpadasyodādheś ca yat /
T04acatstvu:107: antaraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ buddhasya ca tad antaram // 5 iti
T04acatstvu:109: acintyam iti yathoktaṃ sa khalu bho jinaputra bodhisattva evam imāṃ bhūmim anugato 'cintyaṃ ca nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ pratilabhate 'nāvaraṇaṃ cetyādi /
T04acatstvu:111: piṇḍiteṣu rajāṃsi yāvanti guṇā daśamyāṃ bhavanti tāvanta ihāsya tāvad ity anidarśanam uktaṃ bhagavatyāṃ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmivyavasthitabodhisattvaguṇanirdeśe
T04acatstvu:113: tad yathā śūnyatālakṣaṇam animittalakṣaṇam apraṇihitalakṣaṇaṃ niḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ pratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇaṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ paratantralakṣaṇaṃ ca /
T04acatstvu:114: tatra ṣadbhiḥ ṣadbhis tribhir deśanākṛtyārthabhedena yathākramaṃ trīṇi lakṣaṇāny uktāni /
T04acatstvu:115: ekenaiṣām eva trayāṇām upasaṃhāraḥ ṣadbhiḥ saptabhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ saptabhiś ca śeṣāniboddhavyāni /
T04acatstvu:116: iti māyādidṛṣṭāntair ityādi saptabhiḥ ślokair yathākramaṃ guṇakathanamukhena sarveṣām
T04acatstvu:117: upasaṃhāraḥ kām apy acintyāṃ paramagambhirāvasthāṃ prāptatvād asya vihārasyeti bhavaddṛśā
T04acatstvu:119: asyām eva bhuvi sattvānāṃ pratiṣṭhāpanāya puṇyapariṇāmanam ity anyaḥ // //
T04acatstvu:123: phalāvasthām ārabhya sarva evānāśravā dharmāḥ sarvaprakārām anuttarāṃ viśuddhim upagatavantaḥ saṃbuddhākhyāṃ pratilabhante /
T04acatstvu:124: teṣāṃ hetvavasthāyām eva tāvad aśūnyatā prāg eva phalāvasthāyām ity āha //
T04acatstvu:126: anutpannam anālayam iti anutpannasvabhāvenetyāder yāvad gambhīrāya namo 'stu ta ity etadantasya sūcanam //
T04acatstvu:131: abhimukhyāḥ prabhṛti viśeṣataḥ pratilabdhānām anutpādādīnāṃ niratiśayārthena pañca tasyāḥ prabhṛti nirodhalābhād āvaraṇadvayavāsanāśeṣasyāpy abhāvāt paramagāmbhīryārthenaikaḥ /
T04acatstvu:132: evaṃ stute stuto bhūyāḥ saṃvṛtyeti śeṣaḥ athavā kiṃ bata stutaḥ paramārthena /
T04acatstvu:135: idānīṃ saṃvṛtyāpi stuter asaṃbhavaṃ pratipādayann āha /
T04acatstvu:140: grāhakagrāhyanirmukto bhagavān sa ca grāhake grāhye ca caratīti /
T04acatstvu:142: acintyapratītyasamutpādadharmatayā saty advaye 'pi prakṛter abhāvād iti //
T04acatstvu:147: etāvantam evārtham adhikṛtyābhisamayakramaḥ prajñāpāramitādiṣu vistareṇokto boddhavyaḥ // //
